programlisting: <lexicographicResource uri="http://example.com" langCode="en"> <entry id="colour"> <headword>colour</headword> <partOfSpeech tag="n"/> <label tag="europeanSpelling"/> <sense id="colour-1"> <definition>red, blue, yellow etc.</definition> <example><text>What is your favourite colour?</text></example> </sense> </entry> <entry id="color"> <headword>color</headword> <partOfSpeech tag="n"/> <label tag="americanSpelling"/> </entry> <relation type="variants"> <member memberID="colour" obverseListingOrder="0"/> <member memberID="color" obverseListingOrder="0"/> </relation> <relationType type="variants"> <description>words which differ only in spelling</description> <memberType type="entry" min="2" hint="navigate" role="obverse"/> </relationType> </lexicographicResource>
